Event.name: Response_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Trigger</fen> elicits a <fen>Response</fen> by some <fen>Responding_entity</fen> or an <fen>Agent</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Responding_entity
Arg.definition: <def-root>A non-agentive entity that is impinged upon by a <fen>Trigger</fen> event to which they respond.</def-root>

Arg.name: Trigger
Arg.definition: <def-root>An event that impinges upon the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Responding_entity</fen> and produces a <fen>Response</fen> from it.</def-root>

Arg.name: Response
Arg.definition: <def-root>The means action whereby the <fen>Agent</fen> responds to the <fen>Trigger</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The intentional <fen>Agent</fen> that is impinged upon by a <fen>Trigger</fen> event to which they respond.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>A characterization of the <fen>Responding_entity</fen>, <fen>Agent</fen>, or their <fen>Response</fen> action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location in which the <fen>Response</fen> action takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Agent</fen> intends to accomplish by performing the <fen>Response</fen> action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The point in time when the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Responding_entity</fen> manifests its <fen>Response</fen> to the <fen>Trigger</fen> .</def-root>
